newsitem.title: USA: Seeq Technology says names Gary Fish CFO.
newsitem.headline: Seeq Technology says names Gary Fish CFO.

text.p: SEEQ Technology Inc said Monday it appointed Gary Fish to vice president and chief financial officer.
Fish has been with the company for 13 years, most recently as corporate controller. It could not immediately be learned whom Fish was replacing.

The company also said it has appointed Robert Frostholm as vice president of sales and marketing. Frostholm will be responsible for sales, marketing, marketing communications, and strategic planning, the company said.
Most recently, Frostholm was director of product sales for Philips Electronics NV unit Philips Semiconductors, North American Sales Organization.
